Package stepPackage

Class Summary
AAAStepUp This is the main class (MIDlet) were the j2me application starts executing
DailyProgress This class is responsible of getting and setting the user daily progress.
DBmanger This the database manager class, it handles all database operations.
DeamonClient This class is responsible of contacting step up deamon.
HistogCanvas The class is reponisble of drawing histograph.
HistoryView This class is responsible of getting and setting the user History view.
LineGraph The class is responsible of drawing a line graph.
NewGroupView The class is responsibel of managing create or join a group view.
ProfileView This class is responsible of setting the user profile view.
ProgressListView This class is responsible of setting the progress list view.
Socketconnection The class manage sending and reciving data to and form Step Up sever using socket connection.
StepOperation The class is responsible of managing steps operations.
StepReciver Handle communication with motionClassifier deamon.
StepsCanvas The class is responisble of drawing the step view.
StepsView Manage steps view which display number of steps , distance walked km,and calories burned.
StringOperation The class contians two functions that perform diffrent string manipulations.
TeamProgress The class is reponsible of managing team progress view
Watcher The class is responsible of commnunicating with Step Up watcher.
WeekProgress The class is responsibel of managing the weekly progress view.
